comment.author: Brenda
comment.text: On the next debate, I want Mr. Trump to ask Mrs. Clinton, "For the first time, I want you to tell the American public why you allowed 4 brave Americans to die in Benghazi when Ambassador Chris Stevens requested increased security 600 times prior to the attack! How could you have allowed them to die in this attack?"

replies.author: Micah
replies.text: I was waiting for it! He had a few perfect opportunities!!!

replies.author: Andrew
replies.text: I recently heard one of the Rangers who was there speak: because they did not stand down as ordered & defied the order & went on to help these men in spite of being ordered not to.... They lost men some of their Rangers; they could not save those in trouble ; they have lost their jobs, security clearance , benefits, pensions , insurance etc. Also are ya aware that never a US plane to rescue these folks was sent; never! These Rangers had to negotiate on their own with a Lebanese pilot to take them to Germany where they saw to the medical needs of the injured, were fed & were allowed to rest...... But never was a US Plane deployed to come save them!

replies.author: Ryan
replies.text: Andrew that sickens me! Thanks for sharing that with us!
